forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 70. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 83. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens over Boston, a gentle stillness blankets the city, punctuated by the sparkling glow of distant lights. The temperature rests comfortably around 70, with a light northwest wind whispering through the trees, providing a quiet reassurance of a changing day ahead. The forecast promises a sunny Friday, where the warmth will rise, pulling the mercury close to 83. The freedom of the open sky invites thoughts of leisurely strolls or perhaps a visit to a local café, where one might relish a morning brew while basking in the gentle rise of the sun.

In the brightening hours to come, consider shedding heavier layers; a simple shirt and light trousers will do well as the day unfolds into its sunny embrace. The mild gusts may offer a refreshing touch, but nothing too tempestuous to disturb one’s day. It’s an ideal occasion to wander through Boston’s parks, perhaps a quiet moment near the Charles River to soak in the vibrant warmth and watch the world awaken. So, whether it’s a casual jaunt or a more exhilarating adventure, today’s conditions beckon the curious to step outside and enjoy all that this lovely summer day has to offer.
